      • WorldManager

        public WorldManager(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 gravity,
                    boolean sleepObjects,
                    float pixelsPerMeter)
        Initialize a worldmanager
        Parameters:
        gravity - gravity of bodies
        sleepObjects - whether to save resources with unmoving bodies by putting them to sleep
        pixelsPerMeter - PPM to scale by

      • WorldManager

        public WorldManager(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 gravity,

                    float pixelsPerMeter)
        Initialize a worldmanager
        Parameters:
        gravity - gravity of bodies
        sleepObjects - whether to save resources with unmoving bodies by putting them to sleep
        contactListener - collision listener for bodies
        pixelsPerMeter - PPM to scale by
